🎧 Premium Wireless Earbuds Battle 2026

Sony WF-1000XM5: 8hrs battery + LDAC codec
Apple AirPods Pro 3: 8hrs battery + H2 chip magic
Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro: 6hrs battery + IP57 rated

Battery life matters. Sound quality wins. Which one's your pick?
#AdwaitX #TechReview #WirelessEarbuds #Airpods

external.description: The flagship wireless earbuds from Sony, Apple, and Samsung compete head-to-head in 2026, each offering distinct advantages in battery endurance and audio performance. Sony's WF-1000XM5 delivers 8 hours continuous playback with ANC enabled, matching Apple's recently launched AirPods Pro 3, while Samsung's Galaxy Buds 3 Pro trails at 6 hours despite premium pricing. Sound quality differences emerge through codec support and driver technology, with Sony championing LDAC, Apple refining its AAC implementation, and Samsung introducing the Seamless Codec for Galaxy device users.
external.title: Wireless Earbuds Showdown: Sony WF-1000XM5, AirPods Pro 3, and Galaxy Buds 3 Pro Battle for Audio Supremacy

record.text: Nokia and Hisense have signed a multi-year patent license agreement, ending all global litigation. Hisense will pay royalties for Nokia's video technology portfolio covering 5,000+ inventions. A major win for both companies. 📺 #AdwaitX #PatentLicensing #TechIndustry #Nokia #Hisense #Patent

external.description: Nokia and Hisense have ended their worldwide patent dispute by signing a multi-year licensing agreement covering video technologies used in Hisense televisions. Announced on January 7, 2026, the deal requires Hisense to pay royalties to Nokia and resolves all patent-related litigation between the companies across all jurisdictions. This marks the first patent license agreement between the Finnish technology leader and the Chinese consumer electronics manufacturer.
external.title: Nokia and Hisense Sign Multi-Year Patent License Agreement, Ending Global Litigation

Weitere Details im Bildtext.

#ItWasAllAMistake #ModeunGeChaggagieossda #SplitterMangaPlus #Manhwa
© G-Anne, Mim, Harara

images.alt:
Der Verlag Splitter Manga+ bringt den Drama-Manhwa »Modeun Ge Chaggagieossda« von G-Anne (Story) und Mim (Illustrationen) nach Deutschland! Band 1 erscheint nach aktueller Planung am 3. Juni 2026. Das Folgeband soll im Oktober 2026 erscheinen.

In Südkorea lief die Reihe von November 2020 bis Februar 2024 auf der Webplattform KakaoPage und wurde mit insgesamt 130 Kapiteln (inklusive Side Story) abgeschlossen. Derzeit sind sechs Printbände erschienen. Der Manhwa basiert auf der gleichnamigen Webnovel, die mit insgesamt 164 Kapiteln abgeschlossen ist.

📜 Beschreibung (Splitter Manga+)》
Durua Valrose macht als junge Frau die erschreckende Entdeckung, dass sie als Schurkin eines Romans wiedergeboren wurde und dazu vorherbestimmt ist, vom Verlobten der weiblichen Protagonistin getötet zu werden. Was für ein Schock! Aber wenn Durua sich daran erinnern kann, das Buch in einem früheren Leben gelesen zu haben – kann sie dann nicht auch die Handlung ändern? Sie versucht genau dazu, ihrem zukünftigen Mörder, Nocturne Edgar, näher zu kommen, aber der weicht nur immer wieder vor ihr zurück. Was die Möchtegern-Heldin nicht weiß, ist, dass Nocturne ein Schwarzmagier ist, der die Gedanken und Gefühle anderer Menschen lesen und beherrschen kann. Nur Durua widersteht seiner Magie, was ihn zugleich fasziniert und beängstigt...

images.alt:
Auf der offiziellen Webseite der Anime Umsetzung von »Oedo Fire Slayer: The Legend of Phoenix« wurde heute der Ending-Song offiziell vorgestellt. Yo Oizumi steuert den Ending-Song »Kagero« bei. Die Anime-Adaption startet am 11. Januar 2026 bei Crunchyroll im Simulcast.

📜 Beschreibung 》
In Edo kennt man ihn als „Feuerschluckenden Vogel“: Matsunaga Gengo war einst der beste Feuerwehr-Samurai der Stadt, gab seinen Posten jedoch aus bestimmten Gründen auf. Als er eines Tages eine Einladung vom verarmten und schlecht angesehenen Feuerwehrkorps des Shinjo-Klans erhält, beschließt er auf Drängen seiner Frau Miyuki, die heruntergekommene Truppe wieder aufzubauen. Gemeinsam mit seinen eigenwilligen Kameraden kämpft Gengo dafür, jedes Leben zu retten, während in Edo eine rätselhafte Serie von Bränden um sich greift, die man nur noch „FuchsFeuer“ nennt.

images.alt:
Auf dem offiziellen X Account der Anime Umsetzung von »Kore Kaite Shine: Draw This and Die« wurde der Starttermin offiziell bekannt gegeben. Die Anime Adaption startet im Juli 2026 im japanischen TV.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Die Oberschülerin Ai Yasumi lebt auf Izu Oshima und verbringt jede freie Minute mit Manga. Als sie hört, dass ihr lange inaktiver Lieblingszeichner Hoshi no Rei auf der COMITIA ausstellt, macht sie sich sofort auf den Weg nach Tokyo. Dort kommt es zu einer schicksalhaften Begegnung, die alles verändert. Ai erkennt, dass sie den Traum, Mangaka zu werden, zwar immer bewundert hat, aber kaum etwas über den Weg dorthin weiß. Mit der Frage „Wie wird man eigentlich Manga Künstler“ beginnt sie, sich Schritt für Schritt in die Welt der Manga Produktion vorzuarbeiten. Eine Coming of Age Geschichte über Leidenschaft, Neuanfang und den ersten echten Schritt Richtung Traum.

Vid en kroppsvisitation hittades dessutom en påse med vad som tros vara två gram kokain.

OpenAI Launches ChatGPT Health, Encouraging Users To Connect Their Medical Records

OpenAI has introduced ChatGPT Health, a specialized mode designed for health and wellness inquiries. This new feature allows users to integrate their medical records and wel…

Telegram AI Digest
#chatgpt #gpt #openai

external.description: OpenAI has introduced ChatGPT Health, a specialized mode designed for health and wellness inquiries. This new feature allows users to integrate their medical records and wellness apps for tailored responses. It aims to provide personalized guidance, but is explicitly not meant for diagnosis or treatment. Users can connect data from medical records, Apple Health, and platforms like MyFitnessPal and Weight Watchers. b.well will facilitate the integration of medical records, connecting to a vast network of providers. Currently, access is limited to a beta group, with a wider rollout planned for all users later. OpenAI emphasizes that ChatGPT Health is meant to enhance user understanding of their health data. The company has consulted with numerous physicians to refine the model's responses over time. The platform can help decipher test results, prepare for doctor appointments, and provide dietary and exercise advice. OpenAI’s analysis shows substantial existing user engagement with health-related questions. This innovation represents OpenAI's attempt to offer useful health-related information through its existing chat interface.
external.title: OpenAI Launches ChatGPT Health, Encouraging Users To Connect Their Medical Records

record.text: New in JMIR Cardio: Technologies, Clinical Applications, and Implementation Barriers of Digital Twins in Precision #cardiology: Systematic Review

external.description: Background: Digital twin (DT) systems are emerging as promising tools in precision #cardiology, enabling dynamic, patient-specific simulations to support diagnosis, risk assessment, and treatment planning. However, the current landscape of #cardiovascular DT development, validation, and implementation remains fragmented, with substantial variability in modeling approaches, data use, and reporting practices. Objective: This systematic review aims to synthesize the current state of #cardiovascular digital twin research by addressing eleven research questions spanning modeling technologies, data infrastructure, clinical applications, clinical impact, implementation barriers, and ethical considerations. Methods: Following PRISMA 2020 guidelines, we systematically searched five databases and screened 330 records. Forty-two original studies met predefined eligibility criteria and were included in the final synthesis. Data extraction was guided by eleven thematic research questions. Mechanistic and AI/ML modeling strategies, data modalities, visualization formats, clinical use cases, reported impacts, limitations, and ethical/legal issues were coded and summarized. Risk of bias was evaluated using a custom checklist for modeling studies, PROBAST for prediction models, and ROBINS-I for observational studies. Results: Most DTs relied on mechanistic models (29/42), including electrophysiology, finite-element structural, lumped-parameter, multi-scale, and CFD formulations; hybrid mechanistic–data-driven approaches and purely data-driven designs were less frequent. Only 18/42 studies explicitly described machine learning or AI, most often deep learning, Bayesian methods, or optimization algorithms, while many referenced ML without specifying the algorithm type. Personalization depended primarily on imaging (32/42) and ECG or other electrical signals (18/42), with vital signs, demographics, omics, clinical records, and wearable/sensor data used in a smaller subset of studies. Visualization was dominated by static figures and anatomical snapshots, with dashboards, animations, and interactive interfaces rarely reported. Clinically, DTs were most commonly applied to therapy planning, risk prediction, and monitoring, particularly in arrhythmia and #heart failure, with additional work in #cardiomyopathy, aortic and valvular disease, and healthy/control populations. Reported benefits focused on improved decision-making and therapy-related impacts, with occasional reports of increased accuracy or faster diagnosis, but limited evidence for downstream improvements in patient outcomes. Key barriers included strong model assumptions and simplifications, high computational cost, data quality and availability constraints, limited external validation, and challenges in real-time performance, workflow integration, and usability. Only 16/42 studies provided open-source code, and explicit discussion of ethical, legal, or governance issues was rare, centered mainly on privacy and data protection. Conclusions: #cardiovascular digital twins show substantial potential to advance precision #cardiology by linking personalized physiological models with clinical decision support, particularly for therapy planning and risk prediction in arrhythmia and #heart failure. Yet real-world implementation is constrained by methodological heterogeneity, restricted data and validation practices, limited openness of code and models, and sparse engagement with ethical and governance questions. Future research should prioritize standardized evaluation frameworks, robust clinical validation, interoperable and user-centered system design, and ethically grounded, patient-centered development to realize the full clinical value of digital twin systems.
external.title: Technologies, Clinical Applications, and Implementation Barriers of Digital Twins in Precision #cardiology: Systematic Review

record.text: JMIR Res Protocols: Correlation Between Prakriti (Body Constitution) and Severity of Structural Alterations in the Lungs of Patients With SARS-CoV-2: #Protocol for a Retrospective Cross-Sectional #Study

external.description: Background: SARS CoV-2, a novel coronavirus, initially appeared in the Wuhan, China, in the end of 2019 and had infected above 31 million people worldwide. Infection can range from asymptomatic to multi-organ failure requiring prompt treatment. 80% of SARS-CoV-2 patients experienced mild to moderate illness, while 5% developed serious illness. Physicians can evaluate a patient's digestive system (Koshtha), digestive capacity (Agni), strength (Bala), and longevity (Ayu) using the bodily Constitution (Deha Prakriti). It also helps doctors estimate a patient's illness risk, severity, disease activity scores, and hematological, pathological, and biochemical changes. The #Study investigated the association between bodily composition (Deha Prakriti) and severity, as shown by structural lung abnormalities in SARS-CoV-2 patients. Objective: To #Study the correlation between severity of Prakriti and structural alterations in the lungs of SARS-COV-2 patients. Methods: This is a retrospective cross-sectional #Study of SARS-CoV-2 patients. The #Research data will be collected from September 1st, 2020 through May 11th, 2021 as India suffering through the second wave of pandemic during this period. It is the retrospective collection of data from hospital records, the data will come from the Acharya Vinoba Bhave Rural Hospital in Sawangi (Meghe), Wardha, Maharashtra, India. Patients will be contacted via telephone and encouraged to visit the OPD and IPD at these institutions or in rural and urban areas of Wardha city. A structured case proforma and a Prakriti assessment questionnaire will be used to evaluate lung structural changes during the #covid19-positive period. Results: Results will be recorded from the observations of subjective and objective parameters. The #Study's primary outcome is to establish a relationship between abnormalities in the structure of the lungs in COVID patients and body constitution. The #Study's secondary outcome will provide a better understanding of the body constitution that is most susceptible to structural changes and severity in #covid19 patients, as well as information about preventive medicine. Conclusions: Statistical investigation will lead to the conclusion that there is a specific association between structural abnormalities in COVID patients' lungs and their body constitution. Prakriti was identified as being more prone to structural changes and severity in #covid19 patients and offering insights into preventive therapy.
external.title: Correlation Between Prakriti (Body Constitution) and Severity of Structural Alterations in the Lungs of Patients With SARS-CoV-2: #Protocol for a Retrospective Cross-Sectional #Study

New sales data and reporting indicate that while Nintendo’s Switch 2 had a massive launch earlier this year, the console’s momentum has slowed as its holiday performance failed to match the success the OG Switch enjoyed during its…

external.description: New sales data and reporting indicate that while Nintendo’s Switch 2 had a massive launch earlier this year, the console’s momentum has slowed as its holiday performance failed to match the success the OG Switch enjoyed during its first holiday season. One senior Nintendo employee blamed a “complicated economic landscape.” On January 8, The Game Business reported that Switch 2 sales in the United States over the holiday shopping season of November and December were down around 35 percent when compared to those of the original Switch during its first Christmas back in 2017.

Unexpected AI use: Negotiating bills.

'Here's my cable bill. It went up. Write a script for calling and negotiating a lower rate.'

It gave me talking points, objection handlers, and when to escalate.

Saved $40/month.

Old school: Send status updates proactively. Don't wait to be asked.

AI glow up: 'Here's what happened this week. Format as a status update that makes my stakeholder feel informed and confident.'

Visibility = trust. Trust = autonomy.

ADHD reality: Interest drives everything.

Boring but important? Impossible.
Interesting but pointless? Can't stop.

AI hack: 'Make this task more interesting. Gamify it. Add stakes.'

Sometimes the reframe is all you need.

record.text: I shipped a package by UPS, then got in the car and told Claude Code on my phone to create a skill to track UPS packages. The pull request was ready when I got home, along with a download link to .skill file.

images.alt:
Pull request screenshot showing:

Implemented a new AI skill for tracking UPS packages with the following features:

Python script using web scraping to retrieve tracking information
Support for single and multiple tracking numbers
Human-readable and JSON output formats
Detailed tracking history with timestamps and locations
